Thatcher Faculty and Staff Matt E. Thatcher Title: Professor, Computer Science & Engineering Department: Computer Science and EngineeringMolinaroli College of Engineering and Computing Email: thatche1@cec.sc.edu Phone: 803-777-2895 Office: Room 2225, Storey Innovation Center Background Ph.D., Information Systems, The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania (1998) M.A., Information Systems, The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania (1996) B.S., Decision Sciences/Finance, The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania (1992) Research My research examines the strategic and economic impacts of information technology (IT) with a focus on four themes: IT value, software patent policy design, IT offshoring, and the social costs of information privacy.
